text: [Music]
the prince and the pauper
long long ago when king henry viii ruled
over london a strange incident took
place
two boys were born on the same day at
the same time
one was born in the palace and thus
became a prince
while the other was born to a very poor
family and thus became a pauper
the pauper's family was only a few miles
away from the palace
this was the sad state of affairs in
those times
where prince edward was given the best
food and clothing the pauper who was
named tom had to beg for a single bite
and wore nothing but rags
as they both grew up
another coincidence was waiting to be
revealed
the uncanny similarity between the two
boys
tom you useless boy
you brought me nothing today
father i don't want to beg
you think anybody wants to beg you fool
if you don't beg then what are we going
to eat and with that attitude you should
have been born in a palace
why were you born in a pauper's house
but how can i decide where to be born
oh shut up you ungrateful boy get out
and bring me some money
the only good thing in tom's life was
professor andrews who taught in a school
nearby
he used to bring different books with
him every week and encouraged tom to
read
books are a man's best friend tom they
will guide you through any situation i
know life is difficult for you
no you don't know
nobody knows tell me professor why
wasn't i born in a palace i don't want
to be a papa all my life it isn't fair
who said you have to be a pauper just
because you were born in a papa's house
but isn't that how it works a papa's
child is a papa and a king's child is a
prince or a princess
but as we grow we can choose to be
someone else
in fact we can choose to be anybody we
want to be
answer me this if i only give you two
options to be a papa or a greedy
dishonest man oh would you rather be
if the only other option is to be a
dishonest man then i would rather stay a
poppa and be honest
exactly you say now you can always
choose does it matter if you were born
in a palace or a small hut
being honest and noble takes courage tom
and i know you have that courage i
believe in you
thank you
one fine day
tom wandered off looking for food
after walking a few miles he reached the
palace
he was amazed to see tall and huge
structures before him
he went around and sneaked through the
bushes to get a closer look
he saw prince edward playing with his
toys
huh
he must pay the prince
i wish i could have a royal life
you dirty boy how dare you enter these
premises
let's throw him out of the palace
just as the soldiers picked tom up to
throw him out prince edward came out
running
what is all the commotion about
this boy was trying to enter the palace
what is your name
my name is tom cante my apologies your
highness i didn't mean any harm i was
only peeping through your window
though he wore very dirty clothes
tom spoke with respect
the prince was curious about the boy he
took tom to his chamber and offered him
food and sweets
tom couldn't believe that he was
standing in a real palace you were very
lucky i wish i were a prince too
don't you find something strange here
tom
there are a lot of similarities in our
physical appearance the same round nose
curly hair
big eyes
i did notice it
but there is one very important thing
the places we come from
what matters in this kingdom is that you
wear these expensive robes and i wear
rags
didn't you see how your guards treated
me they didn't care that you and i look
similar nobody does i don't believe that
wait
why don't we exchange our clothes and
test everyone it will be fun
um
i am not sure come on tom we are friends
now
and so they did tom and edward were
shocked to see themselves in the mirror
wow we look alike
ah
but it's all a dream
we must exchange a close now
what's the hurry
let me test my guards i shall walk out
of this room dressed like a pauper and
you stay here and pretend to be prince
edward
but
what if don't worry tom
everything will be fine
i will leave
now on his way out the prince picked
something up from his locker and hid it
in his dirty clothes
he then walked to the main gate of the
palace the guards didn't even notice him
tom was right
all they care about is what i wear
they don't recognize me
edward went out of the gate and turned
around to go in
but the guard stopped him
wait
enough
we will not let you around our prince
anymore
get out
calm down
i am prince edward
and i am the king what
no you're not
no matter how much he pleaded the guards
were not convinced they threw the prince
out
ah
oh
boy
this is not going to be easy
where do i go now
the prince walked away from the palace
and unfortunately was found by tom's
father ugh you useless boy where have
you been i am very hungry go get me some
food
nobody had ever talked to edward like
that
afraid and confused he left to look for
some food
as he walked down the street prince
edward was shocked to see what lay in
front of him
people in my kingdom are so poor
this is unbelievable
we waste food every day in the palace
and here they don't have enough to feed
even a family of two
meanwhile tom tried his best to convince
everyone around that he was not prince
edward
but nobody was ready to listen
everybody around him looked confused
is he alright
something seems wrong with him
i don't know
i asked him about the great seal of
england and he replied saying that he
doesn't know about it he is the prince
it's his duty to keep the seal safe
how can he not know
[Music]
forgive me but is it possible that he's
forgotten the same way he seems to have
forgotten that he's prince edward not
thump tom the pawpa
oh lord that would be terrible
king's health worsens with each passing
day and his son loses his memory
lord saves this kingdom
tom wanted edward to get back to the
palace soon
but at the same time he realized that he
had to take care of his kingdom till the
real prince returns
after all prince edward was his friend
and he would not let him down
tom was wise and intelligent he strongly
took over his duties and learned quickly
everybody in the palace slowly began to
trust him and grew fond of their prince
he was a well-read boy
the knowledge he gathered while reading
the books given by professor andrew was
used well
his wisdom was appreciated he was humble
and generous to all
everything was going fine until one day
a sad thing happened
king henry viii
passed away
the palace mourned for their king
[Music]
i am sorry for your loss
but
it is now time to crown you as our king
well
what
but what's the hurry
people of this kingdom need you prince
and you have learnt enough
this has to be done i will arrange for
the coronation ceremony
tom liked it in the palace but he very
well knew that it was not his life to
live
he didn't want to be crowned the king
he sent his men out in the streets to
look for prince edward
but since the guards didn't know which
poor boy to look for they always
returned with no news
tom was getting worried for the prince
while every night tom wished with all
his heart for the prince to return
edward found himself in yet another
trouble
once walking down the streets edward was
captured by two crooks who forced him to
steal
although edward didn't really steal
and put in the prison
that day he was to be taken to the court
edward was ready for worse
but unexpectedly
your honor there has been a mistake
my guards picked this boy up thinking
him to be a thief
but he didn't steal anything
i request you to let him go your honor
edward was set free he thanked the
merciful man and made a small request
i have a very important message to be
taken to the palace
prince edward is being crowned king
tomorrow could you please take me to the
palace immediately
the man didn't believe edward but since
he too wished to attend the coronation
ceremony he agreed to take edward along
the next day inside the palace everybody
had assembled to cheer for their new
king
[Music]
it is a historic day for all of us
today we crown our new king
king edward
everybody was very excited just as the
crown was about to be placed upon tom's
head
no
wait
i am the real prince edward
what how dare you look at your clothes
guards arrest him no
let me go
guards stand down he is telling the
truth lord saint john
he is prince edward and i'm tom cante i
tried to tell you all but you didn't
believe me how is that possible if you
still don't believe us then here
isn't anybody worried about the great
seal of england
i took it with me when i left the palace
prince edward and tom narrated the whole
incident
everybody was shocked to hear that their
real prince was wandering out on the
streets
my apologies prince i tried to look for
you please take your rightful place as
the king
tom
you are my true friend
you diligently took care of my duties
while i was away
i am very impressed with your honesty
you could have easily lied to prove me
wrong and taken away my throne your
highness i might be a proper son but i
don't choose to be a dishonest man
i am so honored to have known you tom
would you accept to be my personal
advisor this kingdom needs your wisdom
and knowledge
i would be grateful your highness
as soon as the real prince was crowned
to be the king of england he immediately
made some major changes in the rules and
regulations of his kingdom
watching the poverty around had moved
him deeply he stayed a merciful king
throughout his reign
the kingdom was inspired by tom canty
and his honesty
king edward and tom canty stayed close
friends for the rest of their lives the
end
[Music]
happy prince
one day in heaven god found two of his
servants just sitting there doing
nothing
they looked unhappy
hey
it's heaven
you can't just be unhappy here
what is the reason for your unhappiness
[Music]
we have nothing to do
we're idle and that's why we are unhappy
okay go fly down to earth find two best
things from a city and get them to me
and thus the servants of god flew away
from heaven to earth
the statue was located in the heart of
the city
he was covered with gold
his eyes were made of blue sapphires
there was a precious ruby on his waist
belt
he set an example for everybody on how
to be happy
hence they called him the happy prince
[Music]
oh my baby
why are you crying
you have to be happy just like the happy
prince
soon winter came the sun was setting and
a swallow bird was looking for a shelter
for the night
he flew near the statue and thought
i can stay at the feet of the statue for
a night i won't feel cold here
and the bird stayed there under the
statue between its two legs
soon after a drop of water fell on the
bird
the bird looked at the sky but the sky
was clear
where did this drop of water come from
it's not raining
and the second drop fell on the bird the
bird was surprised
he decided to find another shelter for
himself
so it came out looked at the statue and
what a surprise the statue was crying
hey
why are you crying
you are the happy prince
no not anymore
why what happened
when i was alive i was very happy i
stayed in the palace and never came out
i used to play in my garden in the
daytime and dance in the evenings i was
like every other human being i also had
a heart like you i'll have
i spent my life happily in my home and
never knew the life outside the walls of
the palace i was very pleased with my
small world and that's why they called
me the happy prince
but now as i am dead and they have put
me here i am of the city i can see the
other side of the coin i can see people
and their sufferings
even though my heart is made of metal
now i can still feel their sorrows and
so i cry
oh
why are you crying now i can see a lady
living little away from of the city she
is too poor to feed her baby
she's stitching a dress for one of the
queen's ladies for a dance in the palace
her little boy is crying as he is hungry
and ill but the lady has nothing to feed
him
she can only offer him water from the
river
oh
what a pity
could you please take my red jewel to
the lady she is in need
but i have to go to egypt all my friends
have migrated there as it's winter here
and it will be warm in egypt
please do this as a favor to me
okay
i'll stay with you tonight and go to
that lady tomorrow morning
thank you my friend
[Music]
in the morning
the bird removed the prince's red jewel
and flew in the direction the prince had
indicated
the bird flew over the city
and then over the palace
[Music]
[Applause]
the bird saw a few girls dancing
and a beautiful girl standing in a
window
i wish i could get my dress in a day or
two
why does that lady take so long to
stitch
the bird flew over the city crossed the
river and reached near a village
where he saw the lady sleeping in her
small house
the bird put the red jewel on the table
then he flew around the bed over the
baby boy
with the moving air around his face the
baby boy fell asleep
the bird flew back to the prince
on his way back to the city the bird
went to the river as he was very thirsty
when the bird was drinking water from
the river a rider saw him there and
thought
oh
the bird is still here
it didn't migrate to any warm climate
he is fighting with the climate not
suitable for him
i should learn something from him
although i'm starving but i should
finish my story soon
the bird then returned to the prince and
the writer returned to his house with a
story in his mind
it's strange
i'm feeling warm although it's cold out
there
it's the warmth of the good deed you've
done today
yes
you're right
i'll fly to egypt tomorrow
don't go please i need one more favor
from you
oh no what is it now
far away from the city i can see a
writer who is writing a story but can't
complete it as he is starving
and there is no fire in his room either
he stays in a little room on the top of
a house
what do you want me to do then
you take one of my eyes and give it to
him
if i
i can't do that
please do it it's a precious blue stone
from india it'll help the writer to live
a good life
okay i'll stay with you tonight and go
to the writer tomorrow morning
the next morning the bird took out one
of the prince's eyes and flew away to
the writer's house
he found the house easily and entered
through the hole in the roof
the rider was sitting on his table with
his head down
the bird kept the blue stone on his
table and flew away
the writer looked up at the stone
did i say it is a gift from one of my
readers
thank you my anonymous friend
the writer was happy to have the
precious blue stone
as the moon came up the bird returned to
the prince
i've come to say goodbye to you i'm
going to egypt tomorrow morning
would you please stay with me for one
more night
oh prince
it'll be winter here and there will be
sun and warmth in egypt i must go there
at the earliest please stop for the sake
of a little girl's life
a little girl's life
yes
there is a little girl in the square she
was selling the eggs but they have
fallen down and they are broken
now the girl has no money to take home
her father will hit her if she goes home
without money
[Music]
take out my other eye and give it to the
girl
her father will earn good money by
selling it thus he won't force the
little girl to work
rather he'll send her to school
no
no
i'll stay with you but i can't take out
your other eye you won't be able to see
them
please do it
please
the bird was feeling very sad to take
out the prince's second eye
he took the jewel to the girl and
dropped it in her hands
[Music]
the girl was very happy to see the jewel
[Music]
what a beautiful piece of glass
and she ran to her home
the bird returned to the prince
he felt very bad for the prince as the
prince now had no eyes
you are a good prince
i won't go to egypt
no
now you please go to egypt it'll be
difficult for you to survive here in the
winter
no i won't leave you
and the bird stayed there
he told the prince many stories and
entertained him
the prince was happy to hear them
oh my friend please fly over the city
and tell me what is going on
the bird flew over the city and told the
prince what all he saw
the bird then returned to the prince
rich people are enjoying eating and
drinking in their houses
on the other hand the poor people are
still starving for food and looking for
shelter
i saw a few small kids suffering in this
winter
they're staying under a bridge but the
guard didn't allow them to stay there
either
i'm covered with fine gold
take them and distribute them to the
poor ones
they should not suffer
the bird sadly took off all the gold
from the prince's body
and gave it to the needy people
[Music]
they were happy to receive some gold
i'll have my bread now
[Music]
i'll have my bread now
i'll have my bread now
i'll have my bread now
and then came the snow
the whole city was covered with the snow
the bird couldn't survive in that
freezing cold
he died one night
when the prince came to know this next
morning
something cracked inside him
it was prince's metal heart which broke
when people saw the dead bird at the
prince's feet
they complained about it
a few officers came to the prince
[Music]
isn't the prince looking ugly
yes he looks more like a beggar than a
prince
and the dead bird at his feet yuck who
will clean this mess
i think we should remove this statue
from this place we'll replace it with
another
one they removed the statue and burnt it
but the broken heart of the statue
didn't burn
so they threw it away
after a couple of days the servants of
god returned to heaven with two things
and offered it to god
what have you got for me
there was a bird and a broken metal
heart
god asked them why those were the best
things of the city
the servants told god that the heart
belongs to the statue of the happy
prince
you did a good job really both these
things are the best i'll keep them in my
garden the bird will sing beautiful
songs and the happy prince will stand in
my city of gold
[Music]
you
